articles.title: At 89 (!), Willie Nelson is still a musical marvel at Palomino Festival - Yahoo News
articles.description: Nelson played a free-ranging, dexterous set at the new alt-country fest, before joining headliner Kacey Musgraves for a singalong "On the Road Again."
